H0.text: what channel is the usa pageant on. NBC

H1.text: what channel is the usa pageant on. E!

H2.text: what channel is the usa pageant on. FOX

H3.text: what channel is the usa pageant on. us

A4.text: The pageant was previously broadcast on NBC.

A5.text: Fox announced that it had acquired the U.S. television rights to Miss USA and Miss Universe, beginning with Miss Universe 2015 and Miss USA 2016.

A6.text: NBCUniversal relinquished the rights to Miss Universe and Miss USA on June 29, 2015, as part of its decision to cut business ties with Donald Trump and the Miss Universe Organization.
